intro: An adventure on the high seas like you've never seen before, with realistic graphics and sounds. Experience the sensation of sailing the entire ocean through the most mythical ships.
description:
Experience the sensation of sailing the most impressive ships across the ocean. Cross the seas and complete missions to feel what it's like to be on the high seas. 
 
Enjoy high quality graphics in realistic scenarios navigating in cruise ships, pirate ship, lifeboat, jet skis, aircraft carriers and much more.

If you like realistic games where to live an experience of another level this is your game. Enjoy the action and speed in Boat Simulator. 

Features:
• Realistic graphics and sounds.
• Choose from more than 10 boats.
• Atmospheric weather changes.
• Accomplish missions and sail the open sea without limits. Enjoy the voyage in an open world. 
• Several cinematic cameras.
• Avoid obstacles and test the circuits. 
• Try from vintage ships to the most current ones.

Are you ready for this adventure on the high seas?
